Articles.Content: I am curious about the easter eggs on KSP. First off, i was trying to find the crashed UFO in the north polar regions on kerbin and i put the EXACT coordinates on the landing auto pilot (with mecjeb) and i still can't find it . I then started to think they removed it in version 0.20. Next, i would love to find the pyramids in the desert region but i am a beginner so baby steps for me. I know a lot more but if all of you can post some different easter eggs that would be great!
Go north from the launchpad on a rover....
Try the Apollo 11 landing coordinates on the MÃƒÂ¼n.
Oh i just found 3 on duna. A buried rover (pretty sure its curiosity, mars rover) , a kerbin monkey face, and a pryramid that sends off SSTV signals.
Go to Bob and you may find a certain creature that is well known to cause problems with spacecraft in the game.

Try the Apollo 11 landing coordinates on the MÃƒÂ¼n.

When they first put the plaque in I landed right next to it and renamed the Kerbals Armstrong and Aldrin Kerman. They're still there and, until Squad make a patch that is incompatible with previous saves, thats where they'll stay as my little tribute to such a great man.

It really must suck to be Michael Collins
The ISA MapSat plugin can find anomaly sites, although I don't know how up-to-date it is.
